mapper.insert: insert into live (id, name, category, deptId, endTime,startTime, remark, nop, pop, addr, rtmpUrl, mp4Url, imageSrc, latitude, longitude, status, createUserId, createUserName, createDate, lastModifyUserId, lastModifyUserName, lastModifyDate, content,auditStatus) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nop,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{pop,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rtmpUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mp4Url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},#{auditStatus})
mapper.update: update live set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startTime = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addr = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rtmpUrl = #{rtmpUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mp4Url = #{mp4Url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imageSrc = #{imageSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, lastModifyUserId = #{lastModifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastModifyUserName = #{lastModifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastModifyDate = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select 2 commentApproveType, imageSrc cover, endTime, 0 hasPassword, id, nop numOfPartake, (case when nop<10000 then concat(nop,"") else concat(round(nop/10000,2),"万") end) numOfPartakeString, 0 partakeState, remark, 1 reportApproveType, startTime, status state, name topic, category type, null watermarkConfig from live where deptId=#{companyId} and auditStatus='2' order by status, startTime desc limit #{start,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{end,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select null allowApprove, null allowClose, null allowDelete, null allowEdit, date_format(startTime,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%S') startTime, date_format(endTime,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%S') endTime, 1 allowShare, null appShortUrl, addr city, 0 commentApproveType, imageSrc cover, endTime, id, pop likeNums, nop numOfPartake, (case when nop<10000 then concat(nop,"") else concat(round(nop/10000,2),"万") end) numOfPartakeString, 0 partakeState, 0 playStreamState, rtmpUrl playStreamUrl, mp4Url, 0 position, remark, content, 0 showPlayView, 0 showWater, status state, name topic, category type, null watermarkConfig from live where id=#{id}

select t.id reportId, t.rid, t.uid, t.sort, t.mediaType type, t.status, t.likeNum,t.content,t.mediaContent video,t.createTime approvedTime,0 duration,t.createTime gmtCreate, date_format(t.createTime,'%H:%i') createDate, '' pictures, '' liker, a.nickname reporter, '' thumbnail, ifnull(f.logo,a.headimgurl) headimgurl, ifnull(f.short_name,a.nickname) nickname, a.openid, b.id imgId, b.url, b.w, b.h, b.watermarkConfig, c.id cmtId, c.content c_content, d.nickname c_reviewer, d.headimgurl c_headimgurl, d.nickname c_nickname, d.openid c_openid, date_format(c.createTime,'%H:%i:%s') c_createTime
from live_rpt t left join portal.userinfo a on t.uid=a.unionid left join live_img b on t.id=b.rptId left join (select rptId,id,content,uid,createTime from live_cmt where status!='3') c on t.id=c.rptId left join portal.userinfo d on c.uid=d.unionid left join portal.users e on t.uid=e.openId left join portal.department f on e.department_id=f.department_id where t.rid=#{rid} and t.status='2'

select t.id, t.rid, t.uid, t.content, date_format(t.createTime,'%H:%i:%s') createTime from live_msg t where t.rid=#{rid} and t.status!='3' order by t.createTime
